fields.name: txtEditShiptoCompleted
fields.fieldText: Information for ship-to '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' updated completely.

fields.name: txtFail
fields.fieldText:
You are unable to create a new customer/supplier.

Please contact the administrator.

fields.name: txtFailCreateShipTo
fields.fieldText:
New ship-to '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' creation failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailEditShipto
fields.fieldText:
Ship-to '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' modification failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailExtendCustomer_ExtendEditGeneralAndSubmitAll_Customer
fields.fieldText:
Extend customer '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' creation failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailExtendCustomer_ExtendEditGeneralAndSubmitSales_Customer
fields.fieldText:
Extend customer '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' creation failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailExtendCustomer_ExtendNoGeneralEdited_Customer
fields.fieldText:
Extend customer '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' creation failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailNewAdditional

fields.name: txtFailNewShipto
fields.fieldText:

Please recheck your information and submit again.
